What is the purpose of "vocabulary" as tag?

1

There are 20 questions using vocabulary, but the tag doesn't have a description.

What should the purpose of the tag be? Does it make sense when there are tags like single-word-requests, word-choice and word-usage?

  • discussion
  • tags

asked 2016-09-17T12:00:24.210

kiamlaluno

1 344

Answers

1

I don't think it has a purpose. We should remove it as some people are using it instead of the more precise tags.
